root.name: Luxor
root.description: Gameplay Â Luxor is an Egyptian themed puzzle game played similarly to Zuma, except that instead of having a fixed position the player can move along the bottom of the screen. The goal is to eliminate incoming colored balls by forming groups of three or more of the same color. The player controlled scarab is loaded with a random color to be shot. Balls will continue to enter the grid until the player has eliminated a pre determined number of them. If a ball makes it into the pyramid, the player loses a life.
